page.title: 06Billingham Golf Club
page.content: On an old map of our area we found Northfield House and when we investigated, we found it was still standing. It is now part of Billingham Golf Club and has been turned into accomodation for the club professional. The club was formed in 1963 and has a lease from Stockton Council for 50 years but the club hopes to continue for much longer. The course covers some 130 acres (which is very close to the areas of land covered in the original Domesday survey of 120 acres) and a lot of work has gone into it with landscaping and tree planting which will show up in years to come. The club has about 1000 members including playing and social members.
